DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate clinical sensitivity specificity Liat™ Influenza A/B & RSV Assay Liat™ Influenza A/B Assay use Liat Analyzer detect presence absence Influenza A , Influenza B , RSV nasopharyngeal swab specimen compare FDA approve NAAT culture .
DOC.brief_title: Detection Influenza A , Influenza B , RSV Using Liat™ Assays Liat™ Analyzer
DOC.criteria: Patients exhibit 2 symptom group characteristic influenza and/or RSV time visit within past 48 hour : 1. fever least 37.8 C ( 100F ) 2. runny stuffy nose 3. coughing , wheeze difficulty breathe 4. sore throat , headache , extreme tiredness , muscle ache 5. infant : decrease activity , irritability , poor feeding Subject able understand consent participation ; minor age 18 , include parent legal guardian Patients undergoing antiviral medication within last 7 day . Patients receive Nasal Spray Flu Vaccine within last 6 week
